name: Anguram Shanmugam
quickNote: I aim to be efficient and effective by writing less code that accomplishes more.

about.question: education
about.answer: B.Sc. Computer Science - St.Joseph's College, Tiruchirapalli

projects.name: Right Work
projects.description: Right Work is a project management tool developed using React and Redux. It features a modern user interface styled with TailwindCSS and provides data visualization using chart.js. The project is deployed and live at the provided URL, and the source code is available on GitHub.

projects.name: dotfiles
projects.description: dotfiles is a side project to manage configuration for various tools such as bash, vim, vscode, nvm, etc. It helps in backing up configurations using scripts and restoring them in the same way, making it useful for setting up a new machine without much effort.

projects.name: React TypeScript WebPack Template
projects.description: React TypeScript WebPack Template is a boilerplate project inspired from "gopinav/React-TypeScript-Webpack-Starter" to start a new React project with TypeScript and WebPack. It is configured with WebPack to bundle the project and TypeScript for type checking. The source code is available on GitHub.

projects.name: expend-inator
projects.description: Really Sorry for the name ðŸ˜…. expend-inator is a simple expense tracker developed using React and Redux. It features a modern user interface styled with TailwindCSS and provides data visualization using chart.js. The project is deployed and live at the provided URL, and the source code is available on GitHub.

resume.name: Anguram Shanmugam
resume.title: React Developer
resume.profile: I aim to be efficient and effective by writing less code that accomplishes more.

projects.name: Invisinet (Cybersecurity, React Web App)
responsibilities: Led React development team, delivering reusable, performant UI components with hooks, context API, and code-splitting for a streamlined user experience.
Implemented best practices and coding standards to optimize the React/TypeScript codebase, ensuring maintainability and reducing conflicts.

Developed and published NPM packages for CLI tools with proper type definitions and semantic versioning, streamlining internal workflows (e.g., an NPM package for AWS SDK integration and a translator tool to manage and maintain translations).
Utilized modern styling approaches including styled-components and TailwindCSS to create consistent UI components across the application.

projects.name: Optus Project (Australian Telecommunication)
responsibilities: Migrated legacy tools from AngularJS to ReactJS, implementing modern React patterns and performance optimizations.
Developed and maintained various tools using Java, Linux servers, Git version control, and Oracle/MySQL databases.
Automated user account control system with Selenium and Java, improving efficiency and reducing manual workload.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Agile methodology for timely delivery of project milestones.

employmentHistory.title: Junior Web Developer
responsibilities: Developed user-facing websites using PHP, JavaScript, and e-publishing tools.
Maintained MySQL databases and Linux servers, establishing a strong foundation in back-end operations.
